title: Install {app_name} with YunoHost
app_notfound: This application is not in YunoHost's app catalog.
yunohost: YunoHost is a server operating system aiming to make self-hosting accessible to everyone.
app_state_warning: WARNING: This app is bad-quality for now. Installation could maybe work, but it may lack important features like backup/restore, and/or it uses deprecated practices that may cause issues on your server. Please be careful.
